ud6.7:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
ud6.7:1.3: Tena kho pana samayena ayasma subhuti bhagavato avidure nisinno hoti pallankam abhujitva ujum kayam panidhaya avitakkam samadhim samapajjitva.
ud6.7:2.1: Addasa kho bhagava ayasmantam subhutim avidure nisinnam pallankam abhujitva ujum kayam panidhaya avitakkam samadhim samapannam.
